title: Workflows: Adding a Set Variable Block
body:
Workflows: Adding a Set Variable Block¶

The Set Variable block allows you to mark a specific point in the workflow.
A contact who reaches this block will retain the variable - now a token of the contact - as they move through the workflow.
This memory allows for more complex if/then blocks to be implemented later on in the workflow.
To use this block, you will need to have navigated to a workflow design tab. Click here to do so from Automation. Refer to Campaign and Phone guides for other workflows.

  1. Place a Set Variable block in your workflow where desired

  2. Enter a name

  3. Enter a value

  4. Click Done

  5. In the workflow, you can now click show more to display variable name
